main event: A witness observed a circular, white object rotating in the sky near Haverhill, Massachusetts on June 7, 1961.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 1,000 feet in the air and the size of a nickel held at arm's length,The object displayed erratic movement and its brightness fluctuated,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds before the object disappeared behind trees,The witness expressed concern and requested an Air Force investigation into the sighting,Additional reports from Project Blue Book indicate other sightings in the area around the same time.
